### Background

This site presents visualization of RHEAS maize yield forecasts.

### Forecast

Maize yield forecast have been done for the following countries using [RHEAS DSSAT](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0176506) coupled model. The yield forecast have been done for the following countries:

1. [Zambia RHEAS Forecast](zambia/outlook.html).
2. [Uganda RHEAS Forecast](uganda/outlook.html).
2. [Rwanda RHEAS Forecast](rwanda/outlook.html).
3. [Zambia Cultivar selection](zambia/cultivar.html).
4. [Malawi Cultivar selection](malawi/cultivar.html).
5. [Tanzania Forecasts](tanzania/outlook.html).
